About me

A dedicated Full-Stack Developer based in Lahore, Pakistan

A junior full-stack developer, I posses an impressive arsenal of skills in HTML, CSS, Javascript, React, BootStrap, Node.js and MongoDb. I excel in desinging responsive websites that offer a smooth user experience. I am also skilled in developing APIs and hooking static websites to the backed to give them life. I am also a team player who thries in collaboratin with cross-functional teams to produce outsanding web applications
